title: An Act relative to prison reform

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Tyler of Boston, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2018) of Chynah Tyler for legislation to establish a review of the impact and effectiveness of facility programming by the Department of Correction including a special commission (including members of the General Court) relative to the effects of health care in department facilities and a special commission (including members of the General Court)  relative to the effects of confinement in the departmental disciplinary unit on the mental health and wellness of prisoners.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
Hearing scheduled for 11/18/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1

Hearing rescheduled to 11/18/2025 from 01:00 PM-08:00 PM in A-1                                                                                                                                    and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
